column4: so I'm  trying to add the chrome repository to my mom's computer because her chrome isn't working and I want to make sure it's updating, but I'm getting duplicate sources.list entry in /car/lib/apt/lists but when I go to /etc/apt/sources.list there are no custom debs in there, which one should i be editing?
I don't want her to lose all her bookmarks
the deb repository will be in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/
